title: rAmacandradisha
sahitya:
rAmacandradisha mama shubhamatimayi kAruya sAndra


anupallavi

  nArAcacApa shObhi nijakara dhrOdAra suguNa nivasana sA-rAmEya vinata suragaNa


caraNam 1    rAma ghana nishicaranika ravi rAma nija mukha ruci vihasita sOma naravarakula mahitala 
lAmara vivamsha vibhUSaNa sAmajAdhipa samAnayAna vara jAnakI ramaNa mauni janAvana
    caraNam 2    nIla naLa pavana jamukhakapi jAla parivrta shubhatama nija lIla vitaraNa hrdamada sura 
sAlakana kOpamitAmbara kAla kAla vara shApa vibhanjana kambukaNTha maNihAra virAjita
    caraNam 3    kEshajita jaladhara sama bhuvanE shapada sarasija vinata surEsha hatanata janakhana bhava 
pAshA pratimAmita vikrama nAshidhA-khilamAjita pankajanAbha cAru sarasIruha lOcana
